TeamMembers.name: Amélie Laurent
TeamMembers.description: Leads the development of the radio station, defines the strategy, and sets the direction for growth.

TeamMembers.name: Ivan Petrov
TeamMembers.description: Responsible for broadcast content, manages editorial policy, and ensures content quality.

TeamMembers.name: Sophie Dubois
TeamMembers.description: Selects music, curates playlists, and oversees the musical style of the radio station.

TeamMembers.name: Alexey Smirnov
TeamMembers.description: Creates an energetic morning atmosphere, engages with listeners, and spreads positivity.

TeamMembers.name: Elena Ivanova
TeamMembers.description: Responsible for the station's image, organizes PR campaigns, and maintains partnerships.

TeamMembers.name: Lucas Moreau
TeamMembers.description: Ensures the seamless operation of equipment and manages the technical aspects of broadcasting.

TeamMembers.name: Natalia Sokolova
TeamMembers.description: Prepares news, conducts interviews, and tracks current events.

TeamMembers.name: Maxime Bernard
TeamMembers.description: Manages the station’s social media, interacts with the audience, and promotes the brand online.
